name: Imperial Common Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the more common or civilian-grade hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs in use by the Interstellar Imperium today.

name: Imperial Ships Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the standard military hulls in use by the Interstellar Imperium today.

name: Imperial FIghters Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the standard military fighter LPCs in use by the Interstellar Imperium today.

name: Imperial Weapons Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the standard military weapons in use by the Interstellar Imperium today.

name: Imperial Rare Blueprint Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enable heavy industry to produce the rare and advanced hulls, weapons, and fighter LPCs in use by the Interstellar Imperium today. (Not used)
